## Mock.returnsOnce() method

Schedules the mock to return a value the next time it's called. If anything is already scheduled it will be used first.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
returnsOnce(value: RETURN): Mock<ARGS, RETURN>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | RETURN | value to be returned. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Mock](./earljs.mock.md)<!-- -->&lt;ARGS, RETURN&gt;
